posts.post_content:
Hi,  I have a few vintage T206 Tobacco cards FOR SALE

Checks, Money Orders, PayPal
Satisfaction Guaranteed for any reason
Postage/Insurance paid

First email gets card

email me at... [URL="frank@centuryoldcards.com"]frank@centuryoldcards.com[/URL]

[IMG]http://centuryoldcards.com/images/1909t206powers.jpg[/IMG]
1909 T206 Mike "Doc" Powers (tough sp)  SOLD
Powers was Ed Planks personal catcher, he died in April 1909..... some say after an injury diving for a ball or running into stands on opening day, or from a sandwich he ate that same game, and others say from a pre-existing condition. Doc was 38.


[IMG]http://centuryoldcards.com/images/1909t206pattee.jpg[/IMG]
1909 T206 Harry Pattee (horizontal, sp)  SOLD

1909 T206 Howie Camnitz (pen mk)   SOLD

Thanks,
